# Gregory Innovo

> AI Software Engineer & Multimedia Engineer. Building LLM-powered agents, fullstack apps, and games from Cali, Colombia. Currently at Rappi. 13+ hackathons, $10K in prizes. Founder of Media Collab. Open to AI projects, hackathons, freelance & full-time roles.

## Portfolio

- [Home](https://gregoryinnovo.github.io/): Single-page portfolio with About, Work, Contact
- [About](https://gregoryinnovo.github.io/#about): Multimedia Engineer & Entrepreneur bio
- [Selected Work](https://gregoryinnovo.github.io/#work): Projects gallery
- [Contact](https://gregoryinnovo.github.io/#contact): Collaboration & contact links

## Projects

- [Foodhy](https://foodhy.com.co/): AI · LLM · Mobile · Startup
- [SellMoreTrips](https://sellmoretrips.com/): AI · LLM · Fullstack · Travel
- [ElderLink](https://www.uao.edu.co/ingenieria/conoce-a-elderlink/): AI · LLM · Voice · UAO
- [Zen Pomodoro](https://zenpomodoro.pages.dev/): Productivity · Web App · Planner
- [Media Collab](https://mediacollab.pages.dev/): Founder · Student Group · Innovation
- [Crossing Biomes](https://appgallery.huawei.com/#/app/C102501697): Game Dev · Unity 3D · Huawei
- [The Adventure of Creation](https://gregoryinnovo.itch.io/la-aventura-de-la-creacin): Game Dev · Educational · Game Jam
